name: btoa
readme: btoa === | [atob](https://git.coolaj86.com/coolaj86/atob.js) | **btoa** | [unibabel.js](https://git.coolaj86.com/coolaj86/unibabel.js) | Sponsored by [ppl](https://ppl.family) A port of the browser's `btoa` function. Uses `Buffer` to emulate the exact functionality of the browser's btoa (except that it supports some unicode that the browser may not). It turns binary data __to__ base64-encoded ascii. ```js (function () { "use strict"; var btoa = require('btoa'); var bin = "Hello, 世界"; var b64 = btoa(bin); console.log(b64); // "SGVsbG8sIBZM" }()); ``` **Note**: Unicode may or may not be handled incorrectly. This module is intended to provide exact compatibility with the browser.
